(Am- phipolis 3, Tarsus 1, Myriandrus 1, Damascus 1) 39 late post. tetradr. (Si- cyon 1, Argos 1, Assus 1, Myrina 2, Cyme 1, Mytilene 1, Methymna 1, Erythrae 2, Clazomenae 1, Colophon 1, Miletus 1, Magnesia Ioniae 2, Chios 9, Mylasa 1, Antiocheia ad Maeandrum ? 1, Rhodes 6, Perge 1, Aspendus 1, Aradus 1, unc. 2 [+2]) 3 dr.
